title: [1.10.X][Crossbow——十字弩]玩腻了弓，那就来射弩吧
author: 青木源
txt_content:
本帖最后由 没糖的葫芦 于 2018-8-3 01:33 编辑 

 介绍
This is a crossbow mod for 1.10.2 that adds (at the moment) 15 new crossbows and 9 new bolts. Each crossbow is able to fire bolts made of the same material or less valuable material. Iron and diamond crossbows are also able to shoot the special bolts - flame, explosive, teleport and spectral - however this could change depending on feedback. Bolts are fairly simple to construct: just a stick and the material that you want it to be, placed above. However in order to make the crossbows you need their respective bindings as well. Feel free to view the images to see the recipes. 

这个模组添加了5种十字弩，9种弩箭，射之前需要先右键装弩箭，然后才能射（需再重复）
 合成表
不同材质的弩或者箭，将钻石换成改材质即可三种不同的线决定了弩的耐久和威力（雾）
